document_name: Poverty alleviation-oriented Governance in the Red Sea State_ 2007- Capacity building1.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SDN/00038981/Poverty alleviation-oriented Governance in the Red Sea State_ 2007- Capacity building1.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Improve the capacity of the state to overall role of  participatory policy-making, regulation and coordination and in managing pro-poor development policy  and strengthened capacity of local government for planning, poverty reduction and good governance as well as engagement of the private sector and civil society in the planning and development of the state.

project_title: Poverty Alleviation-Oriented Governance- Red Sea State
